adrFormatAddress: 24 Maiden Ln Floor 2, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text: Only place I will go for my hair! Leah always does an amazing job with my Keratin and my hair feels soft and amazing after, no more frizz, and it lasts for months without damaging my hair. She is very careful with the products she chooses and meticulous about her results. The whole team is amazing, I highly recommend!

text.text: Only place I will go for my hair! Leah always does an amazing job with my Keratin and my hair feels soft and amazing after, no more frizz, and it lasts for months without damaging my hair. She is very careful with the products she chooses and meticulous about her results. The whole team is amazing, I highly recommend!

originalText.text: Best haircut. I have fine untouched brown hair that was way too long. I came here to get a cut with some layers, and I am obsessed with how soft it feels. The shampoo and conditioner they used,  I loved and bought there as well. I also am happy to know some good tips to style my fine hair. Thanks so much Leah !!

text.text: Best haircut. I have fine untouched brown hair that was way too long. I came here to get a cut with some layers, and I am obsessed with how soft it feels. The shampoo and conditioner they used,  I loved and bought there as well. I also am happy to know some good tips to style my fine hair. Thanks so much Leah !!

originalText.text: Truly heart warming service! There really is no other salon that makes you feel welcomed. I originally came in for keratin treatment for my hair and it was done with much love and care. Sangay was hosting the keratin treatment and was awesome! Broke down how the process worked, handled my hair with much love and care, and explained how I can sustain the keratin. In addition, you can also get your hair cut here! I opted in as I’m growing out my hair. Alex is an honest, amazing barber who was very honest on how to approach the hair growth journey! Highly integrity! Shaped my hair and fixed it to look so much better than what I had before. Highly recommend this salon! I’m also going to be recommended it to others, due to how good it is. Great prices! It’s just that good, highly recommend you try it out!

text.text: Truly heart warming service! There really is no other salon that makes you feel welcomed. I originally came in for keratin treatment for my hair and it was done with much love and care. Highly integrity! Shaped my hair and fixed it to look so much better than what I had before. Highly recommend this salon! I’m also going to be recommended it to others, due to how good it is. Great prices! It’s just that good, highly recommend you try it out!

originalText.text:
I don’t usually leave reviews but I had to leave a review for this place because I’m hooked. As someone with a lot of thin, dry, kinky/curly hair, it’s almost impossible to find stylists that can actually do a good job with it, whether that’s a hair cut or any type of treatment. But this place was a gem I stumbled upon after years of struggling with my hair and paying a lot of money on treatments that didn’t work. Now, here I am two months later after getting my keratin treatment with Leah and I’ve never loved my hair this much! I grew up having to cut my hair, almost close enough to shaving it, to styling my hair and taking care of it in ways I didn’t think possible. My hair is now hydrated, healthy, and a lot easier to manage, plus I get a lot of compliments whether I leave it curly or do it straight now! PS. I came all the way from Texas to visit family here and just had to come back to do my hair because I love them so much!

Aside from them being amazing at hair, going to this salon is like going to your family on Christmas, they’re so homey and loving and so easy to open up to (and I’m an introvert). I say “them” because the entire staff is absolutely fabulous. They don’t just do your hair, they study it, advise you, and give you tips on how to take care of your hair without you even asking. I remember the owner once saw my eyebrows being curly and all over the place and he came up to me while I’m getting my hair done and offered to fix them up for me free of charge, it’s something I didn’t expect but admired because you can see how much they care. They’re not after your money like most other places, they genuinely want you to feel your best as you get nothing less than the best. From talking about our daily lives to them dancing to music and enjoying themselves to their amazing refreshments to getting those warm, tight hugs, you won’t find a better place to treat you as the wonderful human you are!

originalText.text: Everyone was extremely friendly and the salon was very pretty and clean. Yennifer was amazing! I showed her a picture of what I wanted and she recreated it flawlessly. I could tell she was putting extreme care into her work and it showed. I will be back!
